title: Measuring Corporate L&D ROI and Applying Minimalist Learning Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Targets learners with L&D program experience in public institutions and nonprofits, aiming to improve mathematical analysis and data-driven decision-making skills.

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively analyze the economic impact of corporate training programs using ROI measurement metrics.
Learners can propose strategies to improve learning efficiency by over 30% by applying workflow integration design principles.
Learners can design educational curricula using minimalist learning strategies (e.g., 5-minute modules, multimodal content).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
